title: Eden
description: The final installment of the bestselling "The Runners" series is here!Adam is back in Eden, and must now set forth on the path of redemption. However, the path is one not easily traveled. It is filled with death, and betrayal. On top of that, Adam must learn to use his powers. But when they start to take on a mind of their own, Adam must decide what he is going to seek redemption, or run from it.Eden is 12,350 words long.More in "The Runners" Runner (The Runners, Part One)Caught (The Runners, Part Two)Rescued (The Runners, Part Three)Wake (The Runners, Part Four)Eden (The Runners, Part Five)
author: Logan Rutherford
